backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing two features removing statistics and footer attribution, referencing Sections.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including styling, sections, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background/text rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component composing header and all marketing sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive header with branding, navigation links, and mobile menu using smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Scroll: Utility for smooth scrolling to section anchors with header offset.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: All marketing page sections including hero, services, process, pricing, example, about, and contact with neon styling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThemeT: Centralized spacing, container classes, gradients, and shadow presets for the neon theme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a neon dark theme with OKLCH CSS variables, global typography styles, custom utilities, and styled scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom OKLCH color tokens, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, including design requirements, known issues, and feature/version metadata for the marketing site.
